item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-11
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• RT: Jose Andres schools charcuterie guy at Standard Grill in NY. Jumps behind bar: (via @CarolBlymire) #
  • Checking out the tall ships in Boston harbor. #
  • One of the russian tall ships #
  • Tall ships #
  • photo.jpg #
  • photo.jpg #
  • photo.jpg #
  • I'm at Tamo. #
  • Cabernet & Cosmo @ Tamo #
  • Checking out Tamo a restaurant across from the tall ships. So far they have served excellent alcoholic beverages. #
  • I'm at Starbucks - Boylston Street (755 Boylston St, at Fairfield, Boston). #
  • Lobster roll w/ fries & vegetarian spring rolls #
  • Strawberry parfait w/ iced green tea @ Starbucks #
  • I'm at Globe Bar & Cafe (565 Boylston St, Dartmouth St, Boston). #
  • If anyone at the Globe & Cafe is following Twitter please contact our waitress. She's MIA. #
  • Jamacian Chicken Salad @ Globe Bar & Cafe #
  • I'm at Back Bay Station (145 Dartmouth St, btw St James and Columbus, Boston). #
  • I'm at Pour House (909 Boylston St, Hereford and Gloucester St, Boston). #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
